channel.title: Steve Olsher's Reinvention Radio
channel.itunes:subtitle: Become who you were born to be!
channel.itunes:author: www.ReinventionRadio.com
channel.itunes:summary: Steve Olsher is founder of the Reinvention Workshop and author of Journey to You, a step-by-step guide to becoming who you were born to be.
channel.description: Steve Olsher, founder of the Reinvention Workshop and author of Journey to You, a step-by-step guide to becoming who you were born to be, hosts this radio show.

item.title: Interviews with authors Amy O'Brien and Jim Bouchard.
item.itunes:author: www.ReinventionRadio.com
item.itunes:subtitle: Interviews with authors Amy O'Brien and Jim Bouchard.
item.itunes:summary: Interviews with Amy O'Brien, author of Stuck with Mr. Wrong? and Jim Bouchard, author of Think Like a Black Belt.

item.title: Interviews with authors DeAnna Radaj and Darshan Shanti.
item.itunes:author: www.ReinventionRadio.com
item.itunes:subtitle: Interviews with authors DeAnna Radaj and Darshan Shanti.
item.itunes:summary: Interviews with DeAnna Radaj, author of Designing the Life of Your Dreams from the Outside In, and Darshan Shanti, author of The 24-Hour Champion: Discovering AND Living Your Priceless Life.

item.title: Interviews with Dr. Richard Norris and Jin Robertson.
item.itunes:author: www.ReinventionRadio.com
item.itunes:subtitle: Interviews with Dr. Richard Norris and Jin Robertson.
item.itunes:summary: Steve Olsher interviews Dr. Richard Norris, author of Hoof It! 7 Key Lessons On Your Journey of Success, and Jin Robertson, Korea's #1 motivational speaker.

item.title: Interviews with Mark Juarez and Paula Gregorowicz.
item.itunes:author: www.ReinventionRadio.com
item.itunes:subtitle: Interviews with Mark Juarez and Paula Gregorowicz.
item.itunes:summary: Interviews with Mark Juarez, author of Charlie's Thinking Cheese and Paula Gregorowicz and creator of Life Alchemy Coaching for Career and Business Success.

item.title: Interviews with Danny Kofke and Jen Lim.
item.itunes:author: www.ReinventionRadio.com
item.itunes:subtitle: Interviews with Danny Kofke and Jen Lim.
item.itunes:summary: Danny Kofke, author of How To Survive (and perhaps thrive) On A Teacher's Salary and Jen Limm, Chief Happiness Officer of Delivering Happiness.

item.title: Steve Olsher interviews Larry Winget.
item.itunes:author: www.ReinventionRadio.com
item.itunes:subtitle: Steve Olsher interviews Larry Winget.
item.itunes:summary: Steve Olsher interviews Larry Winget, 'The Pitbull of Personal Development.'
